title: Is testing random stuff a reportable offence?
body:
Today, I was out testing - Swain Jungle, ( in normals of course) but the thing was It didnt go to plan>?
The whole team started to 420 flame it at me, but bird man does not give no shits. 
As with all random stuff that i like to test I usually get "reported" for such things that I do.

So is it reportable ?

replies.body: In ranked probably, in normals no

Nope, as long as you're not an ass about it, and don't intent feed with it, you're fine.

Though if you're doing this in ranked please stop.

no but if you feed and dont surrender imma report. its logical to assume you're trolling if you still want to play an unwinnable 1-20 game. of course you can always play bots or custom to try it out. although specifically swain jungle i could tell you thats really horrible and trying it out in norms over bots/custom is a dick move and i dont appreciate your ignorance towards having not thought about any possible viability of this choice, in which there is none.....ok theres some but i bet you didnt build him properly

> [{quoted}](name=GigaPube,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=RMRqHGJi,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-01-27T16:03:55.107+0000)
>
> no but if you feed and dont surrender imma report. its logical to assume you're trolling if you still want to play an unwinnable 1-20 game. of course you can always play bots or custom to try it out. although specifically swain jungle i could tell you thats really horrible and trying it out in norms over bots/custom is a dick move and i dont appreciate your ignorance towards having not thought about any possible viability of this choice, in which there is none.....ok theres some but i bet you didnt build him properly

Genrally jg is to be tested in norms so you can gank real people lanes
yeah bot jungle is no fun coz the game end before you can really do anything,
look at teemo. i dont think he could jungle pre s5. now he can jg ez
Feral Flare jungle worked with teemo fairly effectively actually.
oh how i miss that , 70 stacks, so many Hp on hit
who cares mate go for it even in ranked if you know how to play a champ you can play it in nearly any position its skill > champ picks
As long as you're not breaking the Summoner's Code you're fine.
